sections.content: Welcome to the final step before you will gain complete access to the resources in the Learning Center.

•


🥇 **Gather Testimonials** 🥇 

"Tools Every Freelancer Should Use"

**Summary:**
- Grammarly - to ensure you catch any typos
- Google Drive - documents, spreadsheets, file folders
- WeTransfer - large file transfer

**Action steps:**
- Start using these tools

Remember, take notes. 

If you are still unsure of something, you can ask the professors.

•




"Understanding Testimonials and Building Social Proof"

**Summary:**
- A testimonial is just your client saying something positive about you
- More social proof means clients are more likely to choose you, even if you cost more
- To get a testimonial, you just have to ask once you’ve delivered amazing results
- Share your testimonials on your social media and in your outreach
- As a freelancer, much of your business is based on your reputation

**Action steps:**
- Ask your clients for testimonials
- Share your testimonials on social media

•




"Fundamentals of Closing Via Phone"

**Summary:**
- You will feel nervous until you develop the experience
- Skip the small talk, get straight to the point - people are busy
- You are not trying to talk all the time, the purpose is to understand their problem and find out if they are a good fit for your service
- Ask relevant questions to identify their pains
- It takes practice and experience to get good

**Action steps:**
- Identify good questions to find out if they will be a good fit for your service

Whats one question you should ask during a sales call?

A What their problems/needs are -
B What's their networth?
C Are they free to talk again next week?

•


💵 **Getting Paid** 💵 

"3 Ways to Accept Your Money"

**Summary:**
- Speak to an accountant for anything related to taxes
- Stripe
- Payoneer
- Wise
- Crypto

**Action steps:**
- Decide how you’d like to receive payments

Keep pushing... 

You're nearly done with the Learning Center.

Moneybag Always Delivers.

•




"3 Types of Pay Structures"

**Summary:**
- Gig - job-by-job e.g. per email or per video (good for beginners) 
- Retainer - paid a set amount each month, as long as you deliver the results (great for growing your income in a predictable way)
- Performance-based - paid a percentage for every sale you are responsible for (LOW risk which is great in the beginning charge 10% to 40% per sale YOU generate)

**Action steps:**
- Continue the course

•




"How to Accept Money"

**Summary:**
- Performance-based - use an affiliate link
Payoneer for India, Middle East
- Wise, Paypal, Stripe, Crypto for most other countries

**Action steps:**
- Set up a payment processor

•




"Retainer vs. Performance Based"

•




"What to Do About Contracts"

**Summary:**
- Don’t overthink it
- Take an example and tweak it as needed
- A contract sets the expectations of each side from the start - what you will do, what they will do

**Action steps:**
- Create a contract that sets the expectations from the start

Have you set up your payment processor?

A Not yet
B Yes -

Which have you chose?

A Performance Based -
B Retainer Based -

•


🤵🏽‍♂️ **Onboarding Clients** 🤵🏽‍♂️ 

"How to Onboard Clients Smoothly"

**Summary:**
- You need to gather all of the information about your client so that you can do your job
- You can set up a Google Drive for them to add all the files
- Include a document that explains what to upload in each folder
- Immediately get them results

**Action steps:**
- Setup a Google Drive folder for your client to upload all their relevant information

•




"How to Communicate with Your Clients"

**Summary:**
- Don’t allow your team to contact your client - you should be the main contact
- Build some rapport
- Update them regularly on what you’re doing and what they should expect

**Action steps:**
- Update your clients every day on what’s been done

•




"Your Mission"

**Summary:**
- Congratulations on completing The Client Acquisition Learning Center
- Use everything you’ve learned to earn $500 and get certified
- Where the goal will then become to build a team around you so you can focus on getting rich
- ANY questions you have, message the professors.

**Action steps:**
- Make $500 to get certified
